TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content: Granted. But instead you get a pelican pie. And unfortunately the pelcian is angry and attacks you.

Granted. The universe becomes a white plane of nonexistance except for you, and you are just your conciousness because skin, organs, blood, etc. don't exist.

HAVE FUN!

I wish more people liked Star Trek: Into Darkness.

Granted. It becomes so mainstream that they turn it into an endless telenovel.

I wish there was no pop music.

granted, stupid people everywhere riot due to the lack of pop music to keep them at bay

i wish that Glados replaced SIRI

Granted. GLaDOS floods the people's ears with a deadly neurotoxin.

I wish that Europa Universalis actually worked with the latest DLC.

Granted. But then the latest DLC does not exist.

I wish that i ahd better memory.

Granted. You now remember, with perfect detail, every embarrassment and failure you've experienced.

I wish I knew when I was 20 what I know now.

Granted you split you knowledge and yourself into 20 clones and they are unable to do the most basics things you were able to before the split.

I wish for a speaking sponge not named bob.

Granted. It's named Bobby.

I wish I could control metal.

Granted, but you go insane because death metal is always playing in your head.

I wish to live in a steampunk world.

Granted. You die in a zeppelin crash, just before the steampunk revolution becomes popular.

I wish for some sweet J's.

Granted. but you get sugar disease and die.

I wish it was always spring time.

Granted. Springs come forth and pound you down. They then hop onto every other living thing and mash them. Forever, just as you asked.

I wish I had this beautiful duck :V

Granted. The duck turns out to be hostile and drinks your brain with a silly straw.

I wish I had a kick-butt gaming computer.

granted, the new crappy gaming computer now looks like a butt with a red mark on it and a poo shaped mouse

i wish that i was better at modding

Granted. You now modify people as a punishment for whatever they do.

I wish I had a roomba warrior.

Granted. But it's a rumba warrior and it dances rumba so fast and extremely you die from watching because your brain couldnt handle the amount of epicness.

I wish i wasn't always extremely happy, but also wasnt sad.

Granted. You are no longer capable of having emotions, and decide to get run over by cars.

I wish that time stopped existing.

Granted. The fabric of time and space rips from time's inertia, forming billions of black holes amongst the universe, so much that- ah, screw it, this explanation doesn't make sense in the first place.

I wish for the Space Battleship Yamato.

Granted. It's filled with demons, which proceed to devour you.

I wish I was interested.

Granted. She slaps you.

I wish that I didn't post this.

Granted. Except... Once you post, you cannot unpost. The Grim Reaper comes for you.

I wish for kethane.

granted, it is poisonous to humans and thus kills you

i wish for omnipotence

Granted. Since you are now capable of killing yourself, you are dead. You cannot come back to life without deciding to, and your soul left his magical god-sphere in your pockets.

I wish for a cube of dirt.

Granted, but the dirt cube contains tapeworms

I wish i was a alien(so many ways you can go with this)
